subject: Re: My box is here and set up
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
You should record, it makes it easier. 

 Frank-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Lisby <lisby@...> wrote:
>
> I ran a session last night for the first time, but got nothing. 
There  
> are a lot of radio stations in this area (Baltimore-Washington) and 
I  
> just could not get a tuning that gave me any confidence that what 
I  
> heard wasn't broadcast fragments--and really, nothing came through  
> that made me even wonder if.... Anyway, I went  bed last night  
> thinking that I'm going to prove the exception to the rule and 
this  
> won't work for me, but I'm gonna give it a go again today.
> 
> Any of you tech guys around today if I need some help with setting  
> and other tech issues?
> 
> Ann
>
